challenge.title: For - Listing numbers
challenge.description:
In the code below we have a variable "first" and another "last" with a start number and an end number.

Run "console.log()" to list all numbers between "first" and "last"

nextChallenge.title: Loops - Countdown
nextChallenge.description:
In this challenge you will receive a variable "number" with a random number.

Run "console.log" from that number until it reaches zero.

Ex:
let number = 3;
Output:
3, 2, 1, 0
